definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The role of autophagy-lysosome pathway in neurodegeneration associated with Parkinson's disease.
sentences.chinese: 帕金森病相關神經變性中自噬溶酶體途徑的作用。

sentences.english: In the past, treatment of Parkinson s disease (PD) aimed at the liver - wind.
sentences.chinese: 帕金森病以往多從肝風論治。

sentences.english: The most common speech disorder of parkinson's disease is hypokinetic dysarthria .
sentences.chinese: 運動減少性構音障礙是帕金森病的主要言語障礙。

sentences.english: Currently there is no treatment that has been shown to slow the progression of PD .
sentences.chinese: 目前還沒有一種有效的治療可以延緩帕金森病的進程。

sentences.english: To study effective method for disordered sports of parkinsonism.
sentences.chinese: 探討提高帕金森病運動障礙的有效辦法。

sentences.english: Forthermore, exercise could enhance behavioral resume of parkinsonism .
sentences.chinese: 此外，運動還可促進帕金森病的行爲恢復。

sentences.english: Dr. Bloem and other Parkinson’s specialists were amazed.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的結果令布隆醫生和其他帕金森病專家頗感驚奇。

sentences.english: Dr. Rosales lists environmental risks that increase predisposition to PD.
sentences.chinese: 羅薩萊斯博士列舉了增加帕金森病易感性的環境風險。
這位患者已到了帕金森病晚期，都已經無法行走了。

sentences.english: Levodopa, methylmalonic acid, and neuropathy in idiopathic Parkinson disease.
sentences.chinese: 左旋多巴，甲基丙二酸，與特發性帕金森病神經病變。

sentences.english: Caffeine may reduce chance of Parkinson’s Disease.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡因可以降低患帕金森病的機率。

sentences.english: Brain scans have revealed that the first gene-based therapy for Parkinson's disease was effective.
sentences.chinese: 腦掃描結果顯示首次帕金森病的基因治療有效。

sentences.english: Loss of these neurons is essential for the diagnostic parkinsonian features.
sentences.chinese: 這種神經元的丟失是診斷帕金森病的必要條件。

sentences.english: Dyskinesia make day to day life with Parkinson’s even more challenging.
sentences.chinese: 運動障礙使帕金森病患者的日常生活更加困難。

sentences.english: To explore the Etiology, Pathogenesis and Treatment of TCM by the theory homogeny of liver and kidney for Parkinson's disease.
sentences.chinese: 從肝腎同源理論探討帕金森病的病因病機和治法。
